name: Hussein Kohzad
story: Ismail Sangeen grew up in a small village in Persia with limited opportunities. He was a curious child and always dreamed of exploring the world beyond his village. When he turned 18, he joined the military in hopes of seeing more of the world and making a difference. After completing his basic training, Ismail was chosen to train as a Combat Life Saver, a role he takes very seriously. He is determined to save as many lives as possible, even if it means putting his own life in danger.
